content.title: Bumi (King of Omashu)
content.main_content: Bumi was the eccentric King of Omashu and one of the most powerful earthbenders in the world during the Hundred Year War. He was an old friend of Avatar Aang from before the Air Nomad Genocide. Bumi created Neutral Jing, a unique earthbending philosophy focused on waiting for the right moment to strike.
